page.title: 01DESCRIPTION OF THE AREA
page.content: {An area covering the Ecclesiastical {parish of St.Michaels with parts of {the civil parishes of Bockleton, {Little Hereford, Leysters, Middleton {on the Hill and Tenbury Wells.} A rural area with an undulating, well watered landscape providing lush pastureland, still retaining several wooded areas with a large expanse of Common Land in the centre. Nestling in the valleys are stone built houses. A thinly populated area with mixed farming being the main industry. There are no schools or shops, the population having to travel to nearby towns for these amenities, although still having its own Church, two Public Houses,Village Halland Post Office. The climate is moderate. Wild Life, flora and fauna are abundant mainly due to conservation of some{ } hedgerows, permanent pastures & woods.
